skills.name: Nimble Fighter
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Innate:}} {{ci|Fizz}} ignores {{tip|ghosted|unit collision}}, and takes {{tip|Damage reduction|reduced}} pre-mitigation damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Fizz''' is permanently {{tip|ghosted}}, and takes 4 {{as|(+ 1% AP)}} {{tip|Damage reduction|reduced}} {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} from every instance of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.
skills.descriptionHtml: Innate: Fizz is permanently ghosted, and takes 4 (+ 1% AP) reduced pre-mitigation damage from every instance of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.

skills.name: Urchin Strike
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Fizz}} {{tip|dash|dashes}} through the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, {{as|physical damage}}, and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz''' {{tip|dashes}} a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, and upon colliding with them or if they are still {{tt|within 200 units|of their original location, estimated}} when the dash ends, he deals them {{as|magic damage}} plus {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
'''Fizz''' can cast {{ai|Seastone Trident|Fizz}} and {{ai|Chum the Waters|Fizz}} during ''Urchin Strike'', but not {{ai|Playful|Fizz}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Fizz dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, and upon colliding with them or if they are still within 200 units when the dash ends, he deals them magic damage plus 100% AD physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Fizz can cast Fizz's Seastone Trident and Fizz's Chum the Waters during Urchin Strike, but not Fizz's Playful.
skills.notes:
* ''Urchin Strike'' can only go through walls if the target is on the other side.
* '''Fizz''' will be automatically ordered to [[basic attack]] the target after ''Urchin Strike''.
* ''Urchin Strike'' does not deal damage if the target is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* The physical portion of the effect deals {{tip|basic damage}}, while the magic portion of the effect deals {{tip|proc damage}}. 
* {{stil|Life steal}} applies only on the physical damage component. {{stil|Spell vamp}} applies to both the physical damage and bonus magic damage.

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 55% AP)

skills.name: Seastone Trident
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ci|Fizz}} basic attacks bleed his enemies, continually dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Fizz}} empowers his next basic attack to deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, and has an additional effect based on fatality.
* If this attack kills the target, the cooldown is {{sti|ah|reduced}} and the {{sti|{{as|mana cost}}}} is refunded.
* If this attack does not kill the target, '''Fizz's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} for a few seconds.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Fizz's''' basic attacks rend enemies {{tip|on-hit}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds, refreshing {{tip|on-hit}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz's''' next [[basic attack]] within 4 seconds has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}.

If ''Seastone Trident'' kills its target, its {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to 1 second and refunds {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}. Otherwise, if ''Seastone Trident'' doesn't kill its target, '''Fizz's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}} for the next 5 seconds.
''Seastone Trident'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Fizz's''' basic attack timer.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Fizz's basic attacks rend enemies on-hit, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, refreshing on-hit.
Active: Fizz's next basic attack within 4 seconds has an uncancelable windup, deals bonus magic damage and gains 50 bonus range.
If Seastone Trident kills its target, its cooldown is reduced to 1 second and refunds mana. Otherwise, if Seastone Trident doesn't kill its target, Fizz's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on-hit for the next 5 seconds.
Seastone Trident resets Fizz's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Magic Damage per Tick|{{ap|20/6 to 60/6|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40/6|round=2}}% AP)}}}}

{{st|Mana Refunded|{{ap|20 to 52}}}}
{{st|Bonus On-Hit Damage|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} on the empowered attack, {{tip|persistent damage}} on the damage over time effect, and {{tip|proc damage}} on the bonus damage on-hit.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Seastone Trident's '' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

effects.str:
• Total Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)
  • Magic Damage per Tick: (+ % AP)
• Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)

• Mana Refunded:
  • Bonus On-Hit Damage: (+ 35% AP)

skills.name: Playful
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Fizz}} {{tip|dash|vaults}} in the target direction and balances onto his spear, becoming {{tip|untargetable}}. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again with ''{{ai|Trickster|Fizz}}''.
Slamming the ground deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|dash|vaults}} to the target location while balancing on his trident. '''Fizz''' gains the ability to cast {{ai|Trickster|Fizz}} after a {{tt|{{fd|0.15}}-second delay|Starts on cast}} until he begins to jump off the trident.

Over {{fd|0.75}} seconds, '''Fizz''' then hops off his trident and splashes onto the ground below him, becoming targetable again and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Fizz becomes untargetable and vaults to the target location while balancing on his trident. Fizz gains the ability to cast Fizz's Trickster after a 0.15-second delay until he begins to jump off the trident.
Over 0.75 seconds, Fizz then hops off his trident and splashes onto the ground below him, becoming targetable again and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them for 2 seconds.
skills.notes:
*''Playful'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability early for {{ai|Trickster|Fizz|}} does not.
* After ''Playful'' is used (without activating ''Trickster'') '''Fizz''' can orientate his landing by inputting movement commands before/as he drops for a longer reach (but same radius) on the slow/damage.
* ''Playful'' cannot be used for approximately {{fd|0.5}} seconds after using {{ai|Urchin Strike|Fizz}}.
* {{si|Flash}} cannot be used during either dashes. It may be cast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of completing ''Playful's'' dash.
* The {{tip|untargetability}} partially cancels if '''Fizz''' is knocked {{tip|airborne}} during it, allowing non-[[unit-targeted]] effects to hit him. '''Fizz''' will immediately hop off his trident and splash if this occurs.
* If '''Fizz''' enters {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} during either ''Playful'' or {{ai|Trickster|Fizz}}, the splash occurs after the ''stasis'' ends.
* '''Fizz''' will not become {{tip|untargetable}} if ''Playful'' is used to override a displacement, and he will begin the splash prematurely. If the ability was recast, the splash will not occur at all.{{bug}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 75% AP)
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Trickster
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Fizz}} {{tip|dash|vaults}} in the target direction and slams down, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.
This area is smaller than ''{{ai|Playful|Fizz}}''.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz''' dismounts from his trident and {{tip|dash|dashes}} toward the target location in quick succession. Upon landing, he deals {{as|magic damage|magic damage}} to nearby enemies. The damage dealt is the same as {{ais|Playful|Fizz}}, but in a smaller radius, and without applying the {{tip|slow}}.
Both {{ais|Playful|Fizz}} and ''Trickster's'' {{tip|dash|dashes}} may be directed separately.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Fizz dismounts from his trident and dashes toward the target location in quick succession. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies. The damage dealt is the same as Fizz's Playful, but in a smaller radius, and without applying the slow.
Both Fizz's Playful and Trickster's dashes may be directed separately.
skills.notes:
* ''Trickster'' does not count as an ability activation.
* '''Fizz''' is {{tip|untargetable}} during ''Trickster's'' dash as well.
* The splash occurs immediately if '''Fizz''' encounters terrain that cannot be dashed through (he has to be particularly close to the wall).

skills.name: Chum the Waters
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Fizz}} tosses a lure in the target direction that lands on the ground, attracting a shark that erupts after a short delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them.
The farther the lure flies, the larger the shark that is attracted, increasing the effects. The lure attaches to the first enemy champion that touches it, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them. The shark will {{tip|airborne|knockup}} the target instead of knocking them back.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz''' throws down a lure at the target location that attracts a shark, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area before emerging and chomping at the lure after 2 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted; increasing ''Chum the Waters' '' damage, slow, eruption radius and knock back distance.
{{sbc|Guppy (<455):}} 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knock back distance.
{{sbc|Chomper (455-910):}} 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knock back distance.
{{sbc|Gigalodon (>910):}} 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knock back distance.

Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} can intercept the lure while it is in flight, which attaches to them upon contact and causes the shark to emerge at their position after the same delay. The lure's holder is {{tip|slow|slowed}} and {{tip|true sight|revealed}} for the duration and afterwards is impacted by the eruption but is {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second instead of knocked back.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Fizz throws down a lure at the target location that attracts a shark, granting sight of the area before emerging and chomping at the lure after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies, knocking them back and slowing them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted; increasing Chum the Waters' damage, slow, eruption radius and knock back distance.
Guppy (<455): 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knock back distance.
Chomper (455-910): 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knock back distance.
Gigalodon (>910): 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knock back distance.
Enemy champions can intercept the lure while it is in flight, which attaches to them upon contact and causes the shark to emerge at their position after the same delay. The lure's holder is slowed and revealed for the duration and afterwards is impacted by the eruption but is knocked up for 1 second instead of knocked back.
skills.notes:
* ''Chum the Waters'' will stop its movement if the lure collides with an enemy champion with a {{tip|spell shield}} (does not attach) or upon colliding with {{ai|W|Yasuo}} (does not get destroyed).
* ''Chum the Waters'' is cast from wherever '''Fizz''' is at the end of the cast time. The targeted area does not change unless the ability was cast beyond maximum range.
* If the lure attaches to an enemy champion, a countdown will appear at their position to signify when the shark is about to emerge. The countdown begins from 4 seconds. However, the numbers decrease twice as fast.
